mapper.insert: insert into location_city(city_id, province_id, city_name, city_nickname, city_pinyin) values (#{locationId}, #{province.locationId}, #{locationName}, #{nickname}, #{locationPinyin})
mapper.select:
select c.city_id as city_id, c.city_nickname as city_name, c.city_pinyin as city_pinyin, p.province_nickname as province_name from city c, province p where c.province_id = p.province_id
and c.city_id = #{cityId}
